thread.title: Obama: U.S. Won't Give Up On Bringing American Captives Home From Iran
thread.title_full: Obama: U.S. Won't Give Up On Bringing American Captives Home From Iran

title: Obama: U.S. Won't Give Up On Bringing American Captives Home From Iran
text:
Obama: U.S. Won't Give Up On Bringing American Captives Home From Iran Posted: 07/21/2015 
PITTSBURGH, July 21 (Reuters) - President Barack Obama on Tuesday listed Americans held in Iraq by name and said the United States will not give up until they are returned. 
"We are not going to relent until we bring home our Americans who are unjustly detained in Iran," Obama said in a speech to the Veterans of Foreign Wars group. SAUL LOEB via Getty Images 
"Journalist Jason Rezaian should be released. Pastor Saeed Abedini should be released. Amir Hekmati, a former sergeant in the U.S. Marine Corps, should be released. Iran needs to help us find Robert Levinson," Obama said. 
(Reporting by Julia Edwards; Writing by Roberta Rampton and Jeff Mason; Editing by Doina Chiacu)
